preferences.name: alert_sound
preferences.title: Select sound to play for notifications

preferences.name: filter
preferences.title: Filter notifications to play sound for
preferences.description: Comma separated list of websites to play the sound for. Add "native" to the list to show notifications from other places like extensions.

preferences.name: ignore
preferences.title: Ignore notification sources
preferences.description: Comma separated list of websites to always ignore for notification sounds. This takes precedence over the filter list for sources to play sounds for.

preferences.name: native_sound
preferences.title: System sound to play (if no file is specified)

title: Notification Sound
name: notification-sound
description: Makes a sound when a notification is shown
author: Martin Giger (https://humanoids.be)
